what: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: Sample MIDFIELD student unit record data goal midfielddata provide proportionate stratified sample MIDFIELD data practice working longitudinal, de-identified, individual student unit records multiple US institutions.

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: MIDFIELD (May 2021) contains individual student unit record (SUR) data 1.7M unique students 33 US institutions. MIDFIELD large enough permit grouping summarizing multiple characteristics simultaneously, enabling researchers examine student characteristics (race/ethnicity, sex, prior achievement) curricular pathways (including coursework major) institution time. midfielddata provides sample data (practice) longitudinal SURs 98,000 undergraduates 12 institutions 1987–2016 organized four data tables: student 97,640 rows 13 columns course 3.5M rows 12 columns term 728,000 rows 13 columns degree 47,500 rows 5 columns

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: data set data.table structure. Tools working data provided midfieldr package.
code: # packages used  library("midfielddata")  # Load the individual data tables as needed data(student) data(term) data(course) data(degree)   # Alternatively, load more than one at a time data(student, term, degree)

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: R (>= 3.5.0) data.table Recommended, required.

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: size data tables, installing midfielddata takes time; please patient wait prompt “>” reappear. Console, run: can confirm successful installation running following lines bring package help page Help window.
code: # install midfielddata   install.packages("midfielddata",                   repos = "https://MIDFIELDR.github.io/drat/",                   type = "source") # be patient library("midfielddata") help("midfielddata-package")

title: Course data sample — course
text: Table course-related attributes approximately 98,000 undergraduates enrolled courses institutions. observation one course one term one student keyed student ID combination course, abbreviation, number, section.

title: Course data sample — course
text: data.table approximately 3.5 M observations 12 variables occupying 348 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term Character, academic year term, format YYYYT course Character, course name, e.g., Chemistry,       College Algebra, US History, etc. abbrev Character, course alpha identifier, e.g. ENGR, MATH, ENGL,       composite key (see id) number Character, course numeric identifier, e.g. 101, 3429,       composite key (see id) section Character, course section identifier, composite key       (see id) type Character, predominant delivery method section,       e.g., Blended, Honors, Lecture, Seminar, etc. faculty_rank Character, academic rank person teaching        course, e.g., Assistant Professor, Associate professor,        Graduate Assistant, Visiting, etc. hours_course Numeric, number credit-hours successful course        completion pass_fail Character, whether course offered pass/fail        basis, , Yes, missing grade Character, course grade, e.g., +, , -, B+, , NG, etc.

title: Course data sample — course
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://engineering.purdue.edu/MIDFIELD

title: Course data sample — course
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students course table records student table admitted degree-seeking undergraduates; term table complete term; degree table complete program. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample. terms academic year encoded YYYY value. example, terms academic year 2009-10 institution semester system  encoded 20091 (Fall) 20093 (Spring) summer terms encoded 20094, 20095 20096 depending number sessions.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: Table degree-related attributes approximately 48,000 undergraduates upon completing programs. observation unique student keyed student ID.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: data.table approximately 48,000 observations 5 variables occupying 10.2 MB memory. mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term Character, academic year term, format YYYYT,        student completes program cip6 Character, 6-digit CIP code program student        earns degree degree Character, type degree awarded, e.g., Bachelor's Degree,        Bachelor Arts, Bachelor Science, etc.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://engineering.purdue.edu/MIDFIELD

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students degree table also records student, course, term tables. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample. terms academic year encoded YYYY value. example, terms academic year 2009-10 institution semester system  encoded 20091 (Fall) 20093 (Spring) summer terms encoded 20094, 20095 20096 depending number sessions. Classification Instructional Programs (CIP) codes 2010 CIP. See midfieldr cip information.

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data — midfielddata-package
text: MIDFIELD (May 2021) contains individual student record data 1.7 M unique students 33 US institutions. MIDFIELD large enough permit disaggregation multiple characteristics simultaneously, enabling researchers examine student characteristics (race/ethnicity, sex, prior achievement) curricular pathways (including coursework major) institution time. midfieldata provides sample data (practice)  longitudinal SURs 98,000 undergraduates 12 institutions  1987–2016 organized four data tables: student course term degree Tools work data provided R package  midfieldr.

title: Student data sample — student
text: Table attributes approximately 98,000 students upon admitted degree-seeking undergraduates. observation unique student keyed student ID.

title: Student data sample — student
text: data.table approximately 98,000 observations 13 variables occupying 19 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. transfer Character, stating whether student First-Time   College students First-Time Transfer student hours_transfer Numeric, transfer hours accepted       institution race Character, race/ethnicity self-reported student,        e.g., Asian, Black, Hispanic/LatinX, etc. sex Character, sex self-reported student, values       Female, Male, Unknown age Numeric, age admission self-reported student us_citizen Character, student US citizen? (Yes ) home_zip Character, five nine digit home ZIP code admission high_school Character, high school code last high       school attended entering post-secondary institution sat_math Numeric, SAT mathematics test score sat_verbal Numeric, SAT reading test score act_comp Numeric, ACT composite test score

title: Student data sample — student
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://engineering.purdue.edu/MIDFIELD

title: Student data sample — student
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students student table records term table complete term; course table enroll course; degree table complete program.

title: Term data sample — term
text: Table term-related attributes approximately 96,000 undergraduates terms completed institutions. observation one term one student keyed student ID term.

title: Term data sample — term
text: data.table approximately 730,000 observations 13 variables occupying 82 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term Character, academic year term, format YYYYT cip6 Character, 6-digit CIP code program student       enrolled term level Character, 01 Freshman, 02 Sophomore, etc. standing Character, academic standing, e.g.,       Good Standing, Academic Suspension, etc. coop Character, cooperative education term, Yes hours_term Numeric, credit hours earned term hours_term_attempt Numeric, credit hours attempted term hours_cumul Numeric, cumulative credit hours earned hours_cumul_attempt Numeric, cumulative credit hours attempted gpa_term Numeric, term grade point average gpa_cumul Numeric, cumulative grade point average

title: Term data sample — term
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://engineering.purdue.edu/MIDFIELD

title: Term data sample — term
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students term table records student table admitted degree-seeking undergraduates; course table enroll course; degree table complete program. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample. terms academic year encoded YYYY value. example, terms academic year 2009-10 institution semester system  encoded 20091 (Fall) 20093 (Spring) summer terms encoded 20094, 20095 20096 depending number sessions. Classification Instructional Programs (CIP) codes 2010 CIP. See midfieldr cip information.
